## Pages

### Home
https://fantastic-burgers-a5f758f2.zappy5.app
Experience the ultimate burger perfection at Fantastic Burgers. Handcrafted gourmet burgers with fresh, premium ingredients. Award-winning taste in every bite.

### Services
https://fantastic-burgers-a5f758f2.zappy5.app/services
Explore our menu of handcrafted gourmet burgers made with premium grass-fed beef, fresh ingredients, and award-winning recipes. Sides, shakes, and more!

### About
https://fantastic-burgers-a5f758f2.zappy5.app/about
Learn about Fantastic Burgers' journey from a dream to award-winning burger restaurant. Discover our commitment to quality, community, and crafting the perfect burger.

### Contact
https://fantastic-burgers-a5f758f2.zappy5.app/contact
Get in touch with Fantastic Burgers for orders, catering, or inquiries. Call, email, or visit us today. Pickup, delivery, and dine-in options available!
